name: Rapunzel
description:
You've heard of the tale of Rapunzel, locked away in her tower so that some day she might be saved by a sweet prince. Starling Tales reimagines the classic fairy tale into something more believable.

A kinetic novel re-imagining of the classic fairytale Rapunzel in the world of Starling Tales. See through the eyes of the girl in the tower, the prince who finds her and the witch who had stolen her away as the story unfolds, very close to the original versions, but unique unto itself.

Features:

  • 40 Minutes Playtime
  • 9,000 Words
  • 800x600 Resolution
  • Kinetic Novel
